 PREV   NEXT FRAMES    NO FRAMES    
Packages
acrobot See Sutton and Barto page 270 for a description.
agents Agents are asked to play a legal Action.
algorithms This package gathers all the algorithms an agent can ask for.
dataset Defining samples and sets of samples for use with neural networks.
environment States, Actions and Game Rules.
gambler Description of this game can be found in Sutton & Barto page 101.
jacksCarRental Jack's Car Rental : see the description of the problem
jenga Jenga is an game of skill : the player must take blocks out of a tower without making it fall down.
maabac  
maabacVersion2  
mazes Definition and handling of rectangular mazes.
memory A two-players game : players must remember the value of hidden cards, and find the identical pairs.
missionaries Cannibals and Missionnaries : an old puzzle.
mobileRobot A car, inside a circuit, try to keep inside it, and to drive as fast as possible.
mountaincar The Mountain-car Task as described in Sutton & Barto page 214.
neuralnetwork Implementation of feed-forward neural networks, using backpropagation algorithm.
qlearning There are several ways to store or compute state/action values.
referees Referees/schedulers to control the good behavior of episodes.
statistics package statistics Statistics functions : only Poisson's law at the moment.
tictactoe Implementation of Tic-Tac-Toe.
tiling Generics definitions useful for tiling.
util
